participant_1.background:
I spent time with my friends and family and tried to forget about my parents.
I work out at home so I can listen to my favorite music while I get in shape.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
I have a strange sense of humor, but my mom is my favorite person.
i love to ski in the winter.

participant_2.background:
I don't need to look my best to visit my mom.
i play for the philadelphia eagles.
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
i like long walks on the beach.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: Hey there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, too! I just got back from a vacation to visit my grandpa. It was really nice to catch up with him and play with his train set.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time. I'm a big fan of long walks on the beach, too. I love the sound of the waves crashing and the smell of the salt in the air.
I love the beach, too! I'm from Pennsylvania, so we don't have a lot of beaches here. But I try to go as often as I can.
I'm from California, so we have a lot of beaches here. I'm lucky to live in a place where I can enjoy the beach all year round.
That sounds amazing! I wish I lived in California.
It is pretty great! But it's also expensive.
I'm sure it is! But I'm sure it's worth it.
It is! I love living here.
I'm glad you like it there.
Thanks! I'm glad you had a good time on your vacation!
Thanks! I'm glad I got to talk to you about it.
Me too! It was nice to meet you.
You too! Have a great day!
